trans-unit.source: Flying, trample\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice a Human. If you can't, tap CARDNAME and it deals 9 damage to you.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，牺牲一个人类。若你无法如此作，则横置CARDNAME且它对你造成9点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: PDKA·80 | Zombie Apocalypse | Card Name
PDKA·80 | Zombie Apocalypse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return all Zombie creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, then destroy all Humans.
trans-unit.target: 将所有灵俑生物牌从你的坟墓场横置移回战场，然后消灭所有人类。

trans-unit.resname: PDKA·98★ | Mondronen Shaman | Card Name
PDKA·98★ | Mondronen Shaman | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，若上回合没有任一咒语施放过，转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: PDKA·98★ | Tovolar's Magehunter | Card Name
PDKA·98★ | Tovolar's Magehunter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever an opponent casts a spell, CARDNAME deals 2 damage to that player.\nAt the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当某对手施放一个咒语时，CARDNAME对该牌手造成2点伤害。在每个维持开始时，若某牌手上回合施放了两个或更多咒语，转化CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: PDKA·127 | Strangleroot Geist | Card Name
PDKA·127 | Strangleroot Geist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Haste\nUndying (When this creature dies, if it had no +1/+1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
trans-unit.target: 不息（当此生物死去时，若其上没有+1/+1指示物，则将它在其拥有者的操控下返回战场，且其上有一个+1/+1指示物。）
